name: Rethink Good
description: We are a group of product innovators that co-innovate and engage with multiple stakeholders to customize upcycling/recycling programs to turn “consumer product waste” into functional items and find alternative use. At the same time, we democratize recycling knowledge by conducting educational workshops with the aim to provide transparency on the recycling value chain and processes to better inform recycling habits and product designing. We are a group of product innovators that co-innovate and engage with multiple stakeholders to customize upcycling/recycling programs to turn “consumer product waste” into functional items and find alternative use.
